snippet: Because he is recovering from a herniated disk in his back, Baron Davis is limited to 15 minutes a game, but he aims to make that limited court time worthwhile.
abstract: New York Knicks point guard Baron Davis, who is recovering from a herniated disk in his back, is adapting to his new role as backup.
lead_paragraph: Because he is recovering from a herniated disk in his back, Baron Davis is limited to 15 minutes a game, but he aims to make that limited court time worthwhile.

headline.seo: Baron Davis Adapts to Limited Role With Knicks
headline.main: Now a Knicks Backup, Davis Adapts
headline.print_headline: Now a Knicks Backup, Davis Adapts
